JobDescriptions.Description: Managed a web-based solution (LAMTA) that is used for end-to end RF testing platform using Angular 13, TypeScript, RxJS, LESS, eChart.js, Java Spring Boot.
Created License manager, Test automation platform through effective component structure, navigation, and optimization
Implemented task dashboard with data visualizations using echart.js enhancing data insights.
Collaborated with BA, project manager, and other developers to meet project requirements and goals.
Participated in developing RESTful APIs using Java Spring Boot.
Developed websites and kiosks from front-end to back-end to premier home
builder clients such as Arista homes, Deco homes, Tribute using Nuxt.js, WordPress, Vanila JavaScript, and SASS
Translated mockup designs into fully functional and responsive websites ensuring cross-browser compatibility and multi-platform optimization
Implemented Google Analytics and implemented effective SEO practices.
Managed multiple projects for different clients under tight deadlines.
Developed web-based tolling system application for San Diego Association of Governments (SANDAG) using Angular 7+, TypeScript, Material UI, SASS, Jasmine
Developed and managed services such as case dispute, transponder, pay-by-plate, and payment
Enhanced web functionality, cross-browser compatibility including IE, responsiveness, and accessibility with best practices
Deployed API services and codes to a dev server on a daily basis.
Collaborated with designers, BA, and QA in different countries.
Conducted code reviews and study group with other developers.
